name: Escape From The Kitchen
description:
Evil beings have separated you from your family and friends, they have taken you from your home, on the farm... and they want to cook you!

Yes, you are a carrot, and now your mission is to rescue as many companions as you can and... Escape from the kitchen!

This game was programmed in 24h by Dedalolab for the Devtuber Game Jam 2022

Visit my Youtube channel!
